news.title: Justin Bieber drops new surpise album Swag
news.summary: The album spans just under an hour and features 20 tracks, including ‘Dadz Love,’ ‘Devotion,’ and ‘Therapy Session.’

news.title: Fionn Regan announces Dublin gig at 3Olympia Theatre
news.summary: Regan will embark on his Before The Avalanche tour in autumn, in support of his seventh studio album, O Avalanche

news.title: The Waterboys Live at the Marquee
Album Review: Burna Boy, No Sign Of Weakness
Tom Morello: KNEECAP are "the Rage Against the Machine of now"
news.summary: “What they’re doing in their art is what people could probably stand to do more in their lives: to really speak truth to power,” the Rage Against The Machine guitarist said.

news.title: EXCLUSIVE: Carlisle rockers Hardwicke Circus in Ukraine - Part 1: Subterranean Dronesick Blues
news.summary: Carlisle rockers Hardwicke Circus recently became the first UK or Irish band to undertake a tour of Ukraine since the invasion began over three years ago.

news.title: FILM OF THE WEEK: Superman - Reviewed by Roe McDermott
news.summary: The film stars David Corenswet, Rachel Brosnahan, Nicholas Hoult, Edi Gathegi, Anthony Carrigan, Nathan Fillion, Isabela Merced, Skyler Gisondo.

news.summary: Tickets go on sale next week.

news.title: Album Review: Poor Creature, All Smiles Tonight
news.summary: Supernova debut from trad's trip hop trio. 9.5/10
